title: Chapter 8: Aren’t You Gay?
body:
Chapter 8: Aren’t You Gay?

Chapter 8: Aren’t You Gay?


Ning Xi strongly felt like she was in a dream as she looked at the iceberg-like man who had said such shocking words with an expressionless face. She held her forehead weakly, “Doctor… where’s the doctor? I think I may have damaged my brain in the fall, I’m having hallucinations….”


Next to her, Lu Jingli had an innocent expression, “I didn’t even fall but I think my brain got damaged too?”


At this moment in time, no matter how strong Ning Xi’s heart had become after getting abused a million times over, she could not accept the truth before her.


She had saved a little bun, and now the little bun’s father wanted to repay her with his body?


If this were someone else, then it would be fine. If they were somewhat handsome, then she could still treat it as a romantic affair.


However, this was Lu Tingxiao they were talking about, Lu Tingxiao ahh!!!


Based on appearance, she did have some looks to speak of, but what kind of person was Lu Tingxiao? Surely he had already seen countless peerless beauties.


If he had only taken a liking to her, she would not have been so shocked. If Lu Tingxiao had wanted to play with her after seeing her face, she could still understand, but what he had said was ‘Marry me’, this was practically turning into horror.


Most importantly…


“Aren’t you gay?” Ning Xi blurted.


“Bwahahaha….” Lu Jingli laughed until he fell.


Lu Tingxiao’s face became as black as the underside of a pot, the whole ward became shrouded in dark clouds instantly.


After a long while, Lu Jingli finally managed to hold back his laughter, “If my brother was gay, then where did Little Treasure come from?”


“Well, surrogacy, artificial insemination?”


“If my brother was gay, then why would he want to repay you with his body!”


“To cover up his real sexual orientation?”


“Hahahahaha bro I can’t help you anymore…”


“I also heard… that the two of you are…” Ning Xi’s gaze subtly shifted between the two brothers.


“Cough cough cough….” Lu Jingli was frightened to the point of choking, “Shit, that kind of taste is too heavy for me! Although I’m so handsome that I can go for both the men and the ladies….”


At this time, the center of the storm slowly stood up from his chair, his slender legs were moving closer to Ning Xi with every step, “Jingli, bring Little Treasure out.”


“Ah? Brother, what do you want to do?”


Lu Tingxiao slowly fixed the cuff of his sleeve, “Proving my sexual orientation to Miss Ning.”


Seeing the other’s dark expression and the gaze that wanted to completely devour her, Ning Xi was so scared that she fell out of bed. She retreated behind Little Treasure, this close to just jumping underneath the bed.


“Mr Lu, I didn’t start any of this, it was all nonsense I heard from outside! You should chase all this back to the source! Also, you really, really don’t need to thank me, if you absolutely, definitely want me to give you a request, then I request that you please do not ask me for another request…. Ah, sorry, I have a very important audition coming up later, I have to go now! We’ll meet again if we’re fated okay~!”


Ning Xi spit out her words quickly and prepared to sneak away.


However, after just a few steps, Lu Tingxiao’s cold voice came from behind her, “Did I permit you to leave?”


Ning Xi was so frightened that her legs began to shiver.


My life comes to an end now!


After a few seconds, under her death-awaiting gaze, Lu Tingxiao passed her a piece of paper and a pen, “Could I trouble Miss Ning to leave Little Treasure a note, so that he won’t worry about you when he wakes up.”


Just…. Just like that?


She survived a close shave!


“Yes yes yes no problem! I can even write ten thousand words!” Ning Xi heaved a huge sigh of relief, and picked up the pen to start writing briskly.


Once done writing, deathly afraid of a sudden turn of events, she quickly sprinted off.


Watching the girl leave, the man had a deep expression, as if he were watching prey that had already been collared.


After Ning Xi had left, Lu Jingli immediately sidled up to his brother and bounced, “Brother, am I dreaming? You really fancy Ning Xi? It’s already been 32 years, even perseverance was about to fail soon, and you haven’t taken a liking to any girls. Even I, your dear brother, was starting to suspect if you were bent…”


The moment the word ‘bent’ came out, his brother threw out the words: “Shut up.”


“Yes.” Lu Jingli choked.


He really wanted to ask! Having to stifle this stomach full of curiosity was going to kill him!
